alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 11:33AM CDT until April 09 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant affecting Elmore and Montgomery Counties. .Heavy rainfall yesterday combined with gate operations at Martin Dam will produce significant rises along the Tallapoosa River basin near the Tallapoosa Water Plant and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Lower Wetumpka Road starts to flood. Extensive flooding of low lands occurs and livestock and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 21.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 29.5 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
